pages.text: Hontōni ningen wa, sōshitsu no naka ni iru
Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimi, tagaini shinri o susume ai, mata nintai o susume au-sha-tachi no soto wa
Wazawai naru ka na, subete no waruguchi o itte chūshō suru mono
Zai o atsumete keisan suru (no ni yonen no nai)-sha
Hontōni sono zai ga, kare o towa ni ikasu to kangaete iru
Danjite sōde wanai. Kare wa kanarazu gōka no naka ni, nagekoma reru
Gōka ga, nanidearu ka o anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) bōbō to moete iru arrā no hi
kare-ra no zujō ni kanzen ni ōikabusari
(nogareru koto no dekinai) retchū no naka ni
Anata no omo ga, zō no nakama ni, dō taisho nasa reta ka, shiranakatta no ka
Kare wa, kare-ra no keiryaku o kaimetsu sa se raretade wanai ka
Kare-ra no ue ni mure nasu amata no tori o tsukawasa re
yaki tsuchi no tsubute o nagetsuke sasete
kuiarasa reta wara kuzu no yō ni nasa reta
